spektrogram ( sound + design + code )

LRRH

Trailer for Johannes Wohnseifer's exhibition at LRRH_ studio for textile art. Art Cologne 2018.

Video is created by Studio Corallo and consist of mixed animation, paintings, drawings and footage.

Sound design is a sonofication of airflow through textiles, created with a starting point in recorded windmills and breath.

spektrogram( music   +   sound design  )
